name: OB_HSB_DELIVERY
description: This table contains information about the delivery for this pregnancy, as entered in Stork's Delivery Summary activity.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the episode record (HSB .1).

columns.name: OB_DEL_2ND_STAGE_HR
columns.description: This column stores the length of the second stage of labor in number of hours.

columns.name: OB_DEL_1ST_STAGE_HR
columns.description: This column stores the length of the first stage of labor in number of hours.

columns.name: OB_DEL_1ST_STAGE_M
columns.description: This column stores the length of the first stage of labor in the number of minutes, and is added to OB_DEL_1ST_STAGE_HR to produce the total time.

columns.name: OB_DEL_2ND_STAGE_M
columns.description: This column stores the length of the second stage of labor in the number of minutes, and is added to OB_DEL_2ND_STAGE_HR to produce the total time.

columns.name: OB_DEL_3RD_STAGE_M
columns.description: This column stores the length of the third stage of labor in the number of minutes, and is added to OB_DEL_3RD_STAGE_HR to produce the total time.

columns.name: OB_DEL_BLOOD_LOSS
columns.description: Stores the amount of blood lost in the delivery, in milliliters.

columns.name: OB_DEL_COMPL_CMT
columns.description: Stores the comments for any complications associated with this delivery.

columns.name: OB_DEL_REP_PACKETS
columns.description: Stores the number of suture packets used on a patient during laceration/episiotomy repair from delivery.

columns.name: OB_DELIVERY_DATE
columns.description: This item holds the date when this pregnancy was completed. This is the latest date of delivery of all the newborns associated with the pregnancy.  This column should not be used to determine the birth date of the baby.

columns.name: OB_DEL_3RD_STAGE_HR
columns.description: This column stores the length of the third stage of labor in number of hours.

columns.name: OB_DEL_CRV_RPE_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the date and time when cervical ripening occurred.

columns.name: OB_DEL_DIL_CMP_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the date and time that dilation was complete and/or the mother entered the second stage of labor for this pregnancy.

columns.name: OB_DEL_ONSET_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the date and time that labor began for this pregnancy.

columns.name: OB_DEL_PRES_REF_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the presentation reference point category number for the delivery. The data for this column are entered in the Delivery Summary activity and stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_PRES_LR_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the laterality of presentation (left-right) category number for the delivery. Data for this column are entered in the Delivery Summary activity and stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_PRES_AP_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the anterior or posterior position of presentation category number. The data for this column are entered in the Delivery Summary activity and stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_CHEST_CIRC
columns.description: Stores the baby's chest circumference measurement at birth, in inches.

columns.name: OB_DEL_ANALGES_CMNT
columns.description: Stores the analgesia comments recorded in the Delivery Summary. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_PLCENTA_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the date and time the placenta was delivered. This data is stored in UTC time rather than local time. You may need to convert this data for display in reports. For deliveries documented in the Delivery Summary, the local time can be found in OB_HSB_DELIVERY_2.OB_DEL_PLCENTA_LOC_DTTM.

columns.name: OB_DEL_DELIV_MD_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique ID of the provider (SER) who was responsible for delivering this infant. The data in this column are entered in the Delivery Summary activity and stored in the delivery record.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_SK_1_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's skin color Apgar score at one minute after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_SK_5_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's skin color Apgar score at five minutes after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_SK10_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's skin color Apgar score at ten minutes after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_HR_1_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's heart rate Apgar score at one minute after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_HR_5_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's heart rate Apgar score at five minutes after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_HR10_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's heart rate Apgar score at ten minutes after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_GR_1_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's grimace Apgar score at one minute after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_GR_5_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's grimace Apgar score at five minutes after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_GR10_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's grimace Apgar score at ten minutes after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_MU_1_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's muscle tone Apgar score at one minute after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_MU_5_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's muscle tone Apgar score at five minutes after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_MU10_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's muscle tone Apgar score at ten minutes after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_BR_1_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's breathing Apgar score at one minute after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_BR_5_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's breathing Apgar score at five minutes after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_BR10_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's breathing Apgar score at ten minutes after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_BIRTH_LENGTH
columns.description: Stores the infant's length at birth, in inches.

columns.name: OB_DEL_BIRTH_WT
columns.description: Stores the infant's weight at birth in ounces.

columns.name: OB_DEL_HEAD_CIRCUM
columns.description: Stores the infant's head circumference at birth, in inches. This information is entered in the Delivery Summary activity and is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_1_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's total Apgar score at one minute after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_5_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's total Apgar score at five minutes after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_10_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's total Apgar score at ten minutes after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_DELIV_METH_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the delivery method at birth. The data for this column are entered in the Delivery Summary activity and stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_ANOMALIES
columns.description: Stores the observed fetal anomalies. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_BIRTH_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the date and time of delivery for a delivery record. For values that are not fully confident (for example, if just the year was documented), the confidence is stored in the OB_HX_OUTC_FUZZY_C column. For those values, this column contains the UTC representation of midnight on the earliest date that the value could represent, relative to the time zone where the delivery was documented. This data is stored in UTC time rather than local time. You may need to convert this data for display in reports. For deliveries documented in the Delivery Summary, the local time can be found in PATIENT.BIRTH_DATE.

columns.name: OB_DEL_DEPT
columns.description: This column displays the department where the delivery was performed.

columns.name: PUSHING_START_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when the mother starts to push for the first time.  This data is stored in UTC time rather than local time. You may need to convert this data for display in reports. For deliveries documented in the Delivery Summary, the local time can be found in OB_HSB_DELIVERY_2.PUSHING_START_LOC_DTTM.

columns.name: ROM_TO_DELIVER
columns.description: This item displays the amount of time (in seconds) from rupture of membranes until the patient delivers. For pregnancy episodes, if there are multiples, it will calculate the length of time from the earliest rupture instant documented on a delivery record through to the latest delivery instant.

columns.name: OB_DEL_STEROIDS_C_NAME
columns.description: This column displays whether the mother received steroids for fetal lung maturation prior to delivery. This column links to the category table ZC_OB_DEL_STEROIDS. The column is looking for documentation in the Delivery Summary.

columns.name: MOTHER_ANTIBIO_YN
columns.description: This column displays 'Y' or 'N' depending on whether or not the mother received antibiotics during labor. The column is looking for documentation in the Delivery Summary.

columns.name: FORCEPS_DEL_ATT_YN
columns.description: This column displays 'Y' or 'N' depending on whether or not a forceps delivery was attempted during this labor. The column is looking for documentation in the Delivery Summary.

columns.name: VACUUM_DEL_ATT_YN
columns.description: This column displays 'Y' or 'N' depending on whether or not a vacuum delivery was attempted during this labor. The column is looking for documentation in the Delivery Summary.

columns.name: LABOR_ATTEMPT_YN
columns.description: This column displays 'Y' or 'N' depending on whether or not a trial of labor was attempted. This can apply to both vaginal and c-section deliveries. The column is looking for documentation in the Delivery Summary.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_15_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's total Apgar score at fifteen minutes after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_20_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's total Apgar score at twenty minutes after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_SK15_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's skin color Apgar score at fifteen minutes after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_HR15_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's heart rate Apgar score at fifteen minutes after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_GR15_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's grimace Apgar score at fifteen minutes after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_MU15_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's muscle tone Apgar score at fifteen minutes after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_BR15_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's breathing Apgar score at fifteen minutes after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_SK20_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's skin color Apgar score at twenty minutes after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_HR20_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's heart rate Apgar score at twenty minutes after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_GR20_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's grimace Apgar score at twenty minutes after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_MU20_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's muscle tone Apgar score at twenty minutes after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_DEL_APGAR_BR20_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the baby's breathing Apgar score at twenty minutes after birth. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: OB_HX_GEST_AGE
columns.description: Stores the pregnancy gestational age (GA) in days for an outcome in OB history.

columns.name: OB_HX_DEL_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the delivery site for an outcome in OB history.

columns.name: OB_HX_CLINICIAN_FT
columns.description: Stores the delivering clinician for an outcome in OB history. This is free text.

columns.name: OB_HX_INFANT_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the sex of the baby.

columns.name: OB_HX_OUTC_FUZZY_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the confidence of the outcome date in OB_DEL_BIRTH_DTTM. If anything less than a full date and time was documented for the outcome date (for example, if just the year was documented), this column indicates how granular the documented value was.

columns.name: OB_HX_OUTCOME_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the outcome type for an outcome documented in OB history for a patient.

columns.name: CONT_START_PAT_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the date and time the contractions started according to the patient.

columns.name: DILATION_START_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the date and time that active dilation started for the patient.

columns.name: SKIN_TO_SKIN_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the date and time that skin to skin with the baby was initiated.

columns.name: CORD_CLAMP_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the instant the umbilical cord was clamped.  For deliveries documented in the Delivery Summary, the local time can be found in OB_HSB_DELIVERY_2.CORD_CLAMP_LOC_DTTM.

columns.name: INDUCTION_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores date and time of induction for delivery.

columns.name: DECISION_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the instant the decision was made for an emergent c-section.  For deliveries documented in the Delivery Summary, the local time can be found in OB_HSB_DELIVERY_2.DECISION_LOC_DTTM.

columns.name: BREAST_FEED_ST_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the instant that breastfeeding was initiated.  For deliveries documented in the Delivery Summary, the local time can be found in OB_HSB_DELIVERY_2.BREAST_FEED_ST_LOC_DTTM.

columns.name: SKIN_TO_SKIN_END_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the date that skin to skin was completed.

columns.name: ABDOMINAL_GIRTH
columns.description: The measurement of the baby's abdominal girth.
